mergeResults.content: Gift-shock from awakened wild Mage-Gift; magical channels burned open, causing white-hot agony and blurred vision; Chosen by Senta—bonded; carries red robe hood as evidence

Gift-shock from awakened wild Mage-Gift; magical channels burned open, now stabilized by herbs but fragile; white-hot agony and blurred vision during initial trauma. Chosen by Senta—bonded; carries red robe hood as evidence. Memories of attack psychologically blocked. Commitment: ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control near leadership. Status: arrived Haven as new Herald-Chosen; deemed dangerous wild talent by Healers.

Gift-shock from awakened wild Mage-Gift; magical channels burned open, now stabilized by herbs but fragile; white-hot agony and blurred vision during initial trauma. First Mage-Gift manifestation in generations since Vanyel; energy blast leveled Lisle; no living teachers available. Chosen by Senta—bonded; carries red robe hood as evidence. Memories of attack psychologically blocked. Commitment: ordered Senta to knock him out if he loses control near leadership; maintaining discretion about Mage-Gift. Status: Herald-trainee officially; quartered at Healer's cottage in Companion's Field for safety; deemed dangerous wild talent by Healers.
